name: Nom Nom (Playdate)
description:
Introducing "Nom nom" -  A puzzle game for the playdate!
Your goal is to get three delicious candies in a row to collect yourself some score :)
The game ends if the gravy train of candy gets to the end spot.

Controls:

Special items:



The "ka-boom boom!" bomb will clear 3 candies for you. There is one catch though - you will not get any points when using it.
